alert.note: Alert for Ashe; Watauga (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 01 at 6:52PM EST until January 02 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...In Virginia, Tazewell, Smyth and Grayson Counties. In North Carolina, Ashe and Watauga Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Elevations above 4000 feet are expected to experience the strongest winds. Gusts up to 55 mph are possible on Mount Rogers and the Grayson Highlands of Virginia, and atop Mount Jefferson and Beech Mountain, North Carolina.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
